data.title: Le Fantastique Au Cinema by Laclos, Michel
data.meta_description: Paris Jean-Jacques Pauvert Ed. 1958. - fine/vg./dj. has some wear,mends. TEXT IN FRENCH. The 1st book to deal with the genre of horror & sci/fi seriously. Illus. w. 4 hand tipped stills + 265 stills. 1st edition. Binding is cl.w.dj. - Le Fantastique Au Cinema
data.text:

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books

weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact

you to let you know extra shipping is required.
